import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './writer-portal.css' import Footer3 from '../components/footer3' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill' import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css' const WriterPortal = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [tags, setTags] = useState('') const [content, setContent] = useState('') const handleEditorChange = (value) => { setContent(value) } const modules = { toolbar: [ [{ 'header': [1, 2, 3, 4, false] }], [{ 'font': ['Arial', 'Times New Roman', 'Courier New', 'Georgia', 'Verdana', 'Tahoma', 'Trebuchet MS', 'Impact'] }], [{ 'list': 'ordered'}, { 'list': 'bullet' }], ['bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike', 'blockquote', 'code-block'], [{ 'align': [] }], [{ 'color': [] }, { 'background': [] }], [{ 'indent': '-1'}, { 'indent': '+1' }], ['link', 'image', 'video', 'table'], ['clean'], ['code', 'formula'] ], syntax: true, // Enable syntax highlighter formula: true // Enable LaTeX support } const formats = [ 'header', 'font', 'list', 'bullet', 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike', 'blockquote', 'code-block', 'align', 'color', 'background', 'indent', 'link', 'image', 'video', 'table', 'code', 'formula' ] return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} required /> setTags(e.target.value)} required />
) } export default WriterPortal
